affixs.detail: When any ally receives healing, their final damage is increased by 8%. Lasts for 2 turns. Stacks up to 4 times.
affixs.name: Special Effect

affixs.detail: Party's Bless damage is increased by 20%.
affixs.name: Special Effect

affixs.detail: Sweeper allies' damage is increased by 20%.
affixs.name: Special Effect

affixs.detail: Allies are unable to deal critical hits, but deal increased final damage from skills and Resonances. This increase is equal to critical hit rate x (critical damage - 100%). (Max critical hit rate in this calculation is 100%).
affixs.name: Special Effect

affixs.detail: Foes' damage taken is increased by 10% for each elemental ailment they have, up to 40%.
affixs.name: Special Effect

affixs.detail: Assassin allies' damage is increased by 20%.
affixs.name: Special Effect

affixs.detail: Party's Nuclear damage is increased by 20%.
affixs.name: Special Effect

affixs.detail: Allies are unable to deal critical hits, but deal increased final damage from skills and Resonances. This increase is equal to critical hit rate x (critical damage - 100%). (Max critical hit rate in this calculation is 100%).
affixs.name: Special Effect

mode.detail: Deal damage to make the boss Weakened and gain more points!
mode.name: Devourer of Dreams
